rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 40 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 4:42 PM, 11 July 2025(Friday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Bulacan, Tarlac, Cavite and Laguna within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Rizal(Rodriguez, San Mateo, Binangonan, Cardona, Angono, Taytay, Cainta), Metro Manila(Quezon City, Caloocan, Marikina), Bataan(Morong, Bagac), Zambales(Olongapo, Subic, San Antonio, San Narciso, San Felipe), Pampanga(Mabalacat, Angeles, Magalang, Arayat) and Nueva Ecija(San Antonio, Cabiao) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
